public static ChatMenu getCurrentMenu(@Nonnull

      • getWidth

        public static int getWidth(@Nonnull
                           java.lang.String text)
        Calculates the width of the provided text.
        Works with formatting codes such as bold.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to calculate the width for
        Returns:
        the number of pixels in chat the text takes up

      • getCharacterWidth

        public static int getCharacterWidth(char c)
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • init

        public static void init(@Nonnull
                        org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        This method should only be called by you if you're including this API inside your plugin.
        Initializes all the necessary things for the ChatMenuAPI to function. This method can only be called once.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin to initialize everything with, including listeners and scheduled tasks

      • disable

        public static void disable()
        This method should only be called by you if you're including this API inside your plugin.
        Disables everything necessary for this API to be reloaded properly without restarting.
